Perceptor:

"I told you that this one will be hard to delete"said cooly Perceptor while 
he stand close to Legacy and sensed the program reject all attemps to tried 
to be erased"This wont be easy"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, November 22, 2010 4:20 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The Awakening/nighlight

> <OLD>
>
> "when the MAximal Program is deleted, proceed with the Predacon one"

<NEW>

*DING* �Maximal shell program deleted� The computer emitted as it came
to a completion.

Bump looked happily at the console as he rubbed his hands together
eagerly. With a single index finger he activated the computer again.
It was already primed, and with that single motion set the next part
into motion.

"Initiating Predacon personality purging process." Legacy said as the
screen began to display the progress once again.

0% . . . 1% . . . . . . 3% . . .  . . . 4%

The process seemed a bit slower this time. �Subject Nightlight�s
techno-organic readings are becoming unstable.� The computer chimed as
it analyzed her readings.

Legacy and Santon turned to look at Nightlight, �Could it be that the
program is fighting the deletion process?� Santon said.

�Interesting.� Legacy said in response as he examined the readings for
a moment and then brought them up on his own console for closer
scrutiney.

(TAG)

Preston
